org.opends.quicksetup.event

Interface ProgressNotifier

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CliApplication
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Application, GuiApplication, Installer, Uninstaller

    public interface ProgressNotifier
    Inteface for applications that advertise status to interested listeners.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addProgressUpdateListener(ProgressUpdateListener l)
      Adds a listener to the list of those that are notified about the progress state change of an application.
      void notifyListeners(Integer ratio, org.forgerock.i18n.LocalizableMessage currentPhaseSummary, org.forgerock.i18n.LocalizableMessage newLogDetail)
      Notifies all registered listeners about a change in progress state.
      void removeProgressUpdateListener(ProgressUpdateListener l)
      Removes a listener from this list of those that are notified about a progress state change.

    • Method Detail

      • addProgressUpdateListener

        void addProgressUpdateListener(ProgressUpdateListener l)
        Adds a listener to the list of those that are notified about the progress state change of an application.
        Parameters:
        l - ProgressUpdateListener

      • removeProgressUpdateListener

        void removeProgressUpdateListener(ProgressUpdateListener l)
        Removes a listener from this list of those that are notified about a progress state change.
        Parameters:
        l - ProgressUpdateListener

      • notifyListeners

        void notifyListeners(Integer ratio,
                     org.forgerock.i18n.LocalizableMessage currentPhaseSummary,
                     org.forgerock.i18n.LocalizableMessage newLogDetail)
        Notifies all registered listeners about a change in progress state.
        Parameters:
        ratio - Integer specifying the percentage of the whole process that has been completed
        currentPhaseSummary - localized summary message for the current installation progress in formatted form
        newLogDetail - new log messages in formatted form
